name: 'POPO' The Tailored Cape
description:
Tailored printed khanga cape with front welt pockets. This garment has no sleeves and is worn draped over the shoulders. Fully lined.

Colours: Red/ Green/ Multi

Washing instructions: Dry Clean.

*due to the unique nature of the khanga fabric, colour may slightly vary in shade*

Made in Tanzania.

name: 'MISTARI' The Ruffle Pencil Skirt
description:
printed fitted pencil skirt with ruffle detail at waist, side pockets and back split. Fully lined.

S: Length 74cm/ 29in 
M: Length 76cm/ 30in 
L: Length 78cm/ 31in

name: 'SHIKAMOO' The Shift Dress
description:
Mock layer detail printed dress in kitenge with side mock pockets layered in black net (not pink as in photo) contrast khanga panel at hem and 3/4 length sleeves. Back zip fastening. Regular fit on the body. Fully lined.

XS:Length 114cm / 45in 
S: Length 116cm/ 46in 
M: Length 118cm/ 47in 
L: Length 120cm/ 48in

Colours: Blue/ Red/ Multi

Washing instructions: machine wash seperately at 40 degrees.

*due to the unique nature of the kitenge/khanga fabric, colour may slightly vary in shade*

Made in Tanzania.

name: 'NGOZI' The Bodycon Dress
description:
Printed short sleeve midi dress with thigh slit, seam detail and 'maneno' print front panel. Bodycon fit.

The 'Maneno Mengi' print (Translated: 'Many Words') is inspired 
by the swahili proverbs and sayings found on the traditional 
East African khanga. Local women tend to purchase their khangas based on the featured saying rather than its actual print and use these cloths as a means of quiet communication.

XS:Length 112cm / 44in 
S: Length 112cm/ 44in 
M: Length 112cm/ 44in 
L: Length 112cm/ 44in

Woven cotton and Viscose elastane jersey.

Colours: Red/ green/ black/ white

Washing instructions: Hand wash or machine at 30 degrees.

Made in Tanzania.

name: 'SHOSTI' The Ruffle Dress
description:
Printed short sleeve mini dress with ruffle detail at waist and side pockets. Loose fit on body and fitted skirt. Fully lined.

The 'Maneno Mengi' print (Translated: 'Many Words') is inspired
by the swahili proverbs and sayings found on the traditional 
East African khanga. Local women tend to purchase their khangas based on the featured saying rather than its actual print and use these cloths as a means of quiet communication.

XS:Length 86cm / 34in 
S: Length 86cm/ 34in 
M: Length 90cm/ 35in 
L: Length 92cm/ 36in

100% cotton

Colours: Pink/ black

Washing instructions: Hand wash or machine at 30 degrees.

Made in Tanzania.

name: The 'NURU' Sleeve Dress
description:
Chichia for Made By Africa

Short Sleeve contrast khanga printed dress with fitted body, full skirt and winged sleeves. Fully lined. 

PLEASE NOTE THERE ARE TWO PRINT OPTIONS IN THIS COLOUR (see photos)
Print Option 1: Flourishing flower / Graphic star
Print Option 2: Flourishing flower / Graphic cross

Washing instructions: Handwash or machine at 30 degrees

WAS £125.00


Made in Tanzania.
-------------------------------------

Chichia for Made by Africa collection is a range of ethically produced high quality garments using a combination of Cotton blends and locally sourced organic Cotton jerseys with African printed cloth that brings new life to the perception of everyday basics. In aid of Made by Africa’s concept of supporting local projects, 1 US Dollar from every garment sold will go towards assisting in education for children at the SOS Children’s Village in Tanzania.

name: The 'CHUKI' Tee
description:
Chichia for Made By Africa.

'CHUKI YA NINI SILI CHA MTU' SLOGAN TEE (Swahili phrase, loosely translated means: 'why the envy? I'm bothering no one..'). Loose fit with short sleeves and slight tail at back. 

COLOURS:
1. WHITE
2. GREY 
 
Traditional Tanzanian pieces of cloth used in Chichia collections are known as 'Khangas' and these are used by local women as a medium for conveying messages. The slogan 'Chuki Ya Nini Sili Cha Mtu' draws inspiration from this channel of communication by playfully suggesting to others not to be envious of individuals that express themselves.


Fabric 100 % Organic Cotton

Washing instructions: machine at 30 degrees


Bust Measurements
XS - 44"
S - 47"
M - 51"
L - 55"



Made in Tanzania.


------------------------------
